Entry.JapaneseText: バビログラードでは、シャオルーンが 信仰の対象になっていたが……
Entry.EnglishText: Shaorune was considered to be an object of worship in Babilograd, but...

Entry.JapaneseText: この街には聖獣への崇拝や信仰も 特別なかったとは思うんだけど……
Entry.EnglishText: It doesn't seem like this town particularly worships or believes in a Sacred Beast...

Entry.JapaneseText: 誰も知らないような伝説があるのかも？ 話を聞いてみない？
Entry.EnglishText: Maybe there's a legend that no one knows about? Let's go ask around.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>……誰も知らないようなものを 誰に聞くつもりだ？
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>... If no one knows about it, then just who are you going to go ask?
